content.p: In celebration of Black History Month - Dr Miranda Armstrong presents 'The Politics of Representation: 'Race', Place, and Family Structure'. Dr Miranda Armstrong will present her research titled "The Politics of Representation: 'Race', Place, and Family Structure." This event will take place at 12 noon in Room B55 (LASS) and the ICEMiC cluster lead Dr Elena Genova will chair the session. School of Sociology and Social Policy Law and Social Sciences building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD +44 (0)115 951 5393
